Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark due to a street blockage at Wrigley Field.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark due to a street blockage at Wrigley Field.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Buffalo/88th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Mackinaw, 89th, and Buffalo due to, construction near Buffalo/88th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Mackinaw, 89th, and Buffalo due to, construction near Buffalo/88th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Marquette, Western, and 71st due to, construction near 69th/Bell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Marquette, Western, and 71st due to, construction near 69th/Bell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th due to, construction near 69th/Bell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Loop-bound Brown and Purple Line Express Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown and Purple Line Express trains are running w/residual delays  following an earlier door problem on a train at Belmont. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown and Purple Line Express trains are running w/residual delays  following an earlier door problem on a train at Belmont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
